comment: (bt) one of my favourite dark beers of all time........more of a brown porter or a stout than a brown.......thinking the carafa plus mashing at a high temperature might have resulted in the improved body and mouth feel/lack of any harshness
bt........11/12/13.......still remains my favourite dark beer of all, a bit of a cross between a porter, brown and stout, very smooth and rich, but not too heavy.......a certain repeat
